message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1300000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be a great addition to your operations.  I'm confident this price reflects its true value and provides you with a competitive advantage. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1300000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
